item.title: 欧洲央行行长沃施称降息半点之说 "为时尚早
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员皮埃尔-旺施（Pierre Wunsch）表示，现在就开始考虑在 12 月份降息半个百分点还为时过早。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch said it’s far too early to start considering a half-point interest-rate reduction in December.】

item.title: 乔治-韦斯对冲基金与杰富瑞就和解诉讼进行谈判
item.description: 破产对冲基金 Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisers LLC 及其最大债权人杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group）正在讨论一项可能的和解方案，以解决与乔治-韦斯（George Weiss）同名公司倒闭有关的诉讼。【原文：Bankrupt hedge fund Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisers LLC and its largest creditor, Jefferies Financial Group, are discussing a potential settlement that would resolve litigation related to the collapse of George Weiss’ eponymous firm.】

item.title: 学院寻求在违约前出售曼哈顿部分校园
item.description: 纽约大都会学院正在寻求出售位于曼哈顿下城的房地产，作为与债券持有人达成的协议的一部分，该协议允许学校在 11 月份免于偿还债务。【原文：The Metropolitan College of New York is looking to sell real estate in lower Manhattan as part of a deal with bondholders allowing the school to skip a debt payment in November.】

item.title: 穆勒称欧洲央行的最佳政策选择是定向降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马迪斯-穆勒（Madis Muller）表示，欧洲中央银行应坚持以渐进和有节制的步伐降低借贷成本，他反驳了一些同事提出的考虑采取更大举措的建议。【原文：The European Central Bank should stick to lowering borrowing costs at a gradual and measured pace, Governing Council member Madis Muller said, pushing back against suggestions by some of his colleagues to consider bigger steps.】

item.title: 苹果确认下周举行 Mac 发布会，计划推出 M4 机型
item.description: 苹果公司营销主管格雷格-乔斯维克（Greg Joswiak）在社交媒体上发帖称，苹果公司计划在一周内发布与 Mac 电脑系列有关的消息，这意味着备受期待的配备新型 M4 芯片的机型即将面世。【原文：Apple Inc. is planning a week of announcements related to the Mac computer lineup, marketing executive Greg Joswiak said in a social media post, signaling that highly anticipated models with the new M4 chip are on the way.】

item.title: 铂金股权投资公司支持的英格拉姆在 4.09 亿美元首次公开募股后上涨 17
item.description: 英迈控股公司（Ingram Micro Holding Corp.）在首次公开募股中募集了 4.09 亿美元，定价在市场预期范围内，该技术公司及其支持者 Platinum Equity 在首次公开募股中股价大涨 17%。【原文：Ingram Micro Holding Corp. shares jumped as much as 17% in its trading debut after the technology company and its backer Platinum Equity raised $409 million in an initial public offering that priced within a marketed range.】

item.title: 中国旅游集团考虑收购海昌主题公园
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国旅游集团公司正在考虑进行一项潜在交易，以获得海昌海洋公园控股有限公司经营的一些中国最具标志性的主题公园的控制权。【原文：China Tourism Group Corp. is considering a potential deal to gain control of some of the country’s most iconic theme parks run by Haichang Ocean Park Holdings Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Big Lots 推迟与 Nexus 收购要约有关的重要听证会
item.description: 本周早些时候，私募股权公司 Nexus Capital Management 曾表示，该公司仍需与公司贷款人就约 7.5 亿美元的融资达成协议，因此，Big Lots Inc.【原文：Big Lots Inc. delayed a key court hearing on whether private equity firm Nexus Capital Management should be named the lead bidder at a potential bankruptcy auction after saying earlier this week that the firm still needed to cut a deal with company lenders on roughly $750 million in financing.】

item.title: Makhlouf 称，欧洲央行大幅降息需要 "强有力 "的数据
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员加布里埃尔-马克鲁夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）认为，欧洲中央银行应将大幅降息保留到特殊情况下，他说他更倾向于采取 "谨慎 "的做法，以确保通胀率回落至 2% 的目标不偏离轨道。【原文：The European Central Bank should reserve big interest-rate cuts for exceptional circumstances, according to Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf, who said he prefers a “cautious” approach to ensure that inflation’s retreat to 2% stays on track.】

item.title: 炼油业疲软 俄罗斯燃料出口创八年新低
item.description: 由于炼油活动急剧下降，本月俄罗斯石油产品出口量将创下至少八年来的最低水平。【原文：Russian oil-product exports are on course to hit the lowest in at least eight years this month amid a sharp drop in refining activity.】

item.title: 纽约市陷入困境的出租车保险资产成为 30 亿美元基金的目标
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Marblegate 资产管理公司正在与州监管机构讨论如何接管纽约市破产出租车保险公司的资产。【原文：Marblegate Asset Management is in discussions with state regulators about how it can potentially take over the assets of New York City’s insolvent taxi insurer, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 在尼日利亚被监禁的 Binance 高管获得自由，正准备回国
item.description: 加密货币巨头 Binance 控股有限公司（Binance Holdings Ltd. ）的一名美国雇员自 2 月份以来一直被扣留在尼日利亚，现已获释并乘飞机回国。【原文：A US employee of cryptocurrency giant Binance Holdings Ltd. detained in Nigeria since February has been freed and is flying home.】

item.title: 私营信贷公司被拖入与工会的公开争吵中
item.description: 私人信贷公司彭伯顿资产管理公司（Pemberton Asset Management）与英国最大的工会之一发生了争执。【原文：Private credit firm Pemberton Asset Management has got into a scrap with an unlikely adversary — one of the UK’s largest trade unions.】

item.title: 美国杠杆贷款销售在重新定价过程中创下 9,860 亿美元的纪录
item.description: 今年，企业在美国杠杆贷款市场上发行了创纪录的 9,860 亿美元债务，主要是为了削减现有债务的利息支出。【原文：Companies have issued a record $986 billion of debt in the US leveraged loan market this year, mostly to cut interest expense on existing debt.】

item.title: 量化 "扩展和伪装 "的弊端
item.description: 大家好，欢迎阅读《奇点》时事通讯，它是来自《奇点》世界的每日内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 全球商业保险费率自 2017 年以来首次下降
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，随着财产险市场竞争的加剧，全球商业保险费率七年来首次出现下降。【原文：Rates for global commercial insurance policies are declining for the the first time in seven years amid increased competition in the property market, according to a new study.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦公司 Kaspi.kz 向新用户开放支付系统，与中央银行竞争
item.description: 中亚最大的金融科技公司正在向其他银行的客户开放其专有支付系统，以便在哈萨克斯坦中央银行启动自己的平台之前巩固其市场地位。【原文：The biggest fintech company in Central Asia is opening its proprietary payment system to other banks’ customers to strengthen its position in the market before Kazakhstan’s central bank starts a platform of its own.】

item.title: 欧洲汽车股从盈利缓解迹象中获益
item.description: 在财报季的初期，欧洲汽车制造商的业绩受到了一定的鼓舞。【原文：Beaten-down European automakers are taking some encouragement from the early days of earnings season.】

item.title: 利率下调推动美国房屋销售创一年多来最快增速
item.description: 由于客户对建筑商提供的更多激励措施和抵押贷款利率的下降做出了回应，9 月份美国的新房销售量跃升至一年多以来的新高。【原文：New-home sales in the US jumped to a more than one-year high in September as customers responded to more incentives from builders and a drop in mortgage rates.】

item.title: 出售股票集中度是 ETF 行业的新理念
item.description: 华尔街正在推出一批新的 ETF 基金，这些基金对巨型科技股有不同程度的风险敞口，或缺乏风险敞口。【原文：Wall Street is rolling out a new breed of ETFs with varying degrees of exposure — or lack thereof — to megacap technology shares, which are coming off a rout Wednesday that underscored worries around stretched valuations.】

item.title: KKR 加入私募市场规模争夺战的五亿俱乐部
item.description: KKR & Co.成为第四家管理收费资产突破 5000 亿美元的私人市场公司，进一步超越其收购根基，努力争取更多的客户资产和更稳定的收费。【原文：KKR & Co. became the fourth private-markets firm to eclipse $500 billion of fee-paying assets under management, moving further beyond its buyout roots in a push for more client assets and steadier fees.】

item.title: 大选博彩网站 Polymarket 称特朗普 "鲸鱼 "被确认为法国商人
item.description: 经过基于加密货币的预测市场平台的调查，一名在 Polymarket 上花费超过 4500 万美元押注唐纳德-特朗普将赢得即将到来的美国总统大选的交易员已被确认为法国人。【原文：A trader who spent more than $45 million on Polymarket bets that Donald Trump will win the upcoming US presidential election has been identified as a French national, following an investigation by the cryptocurrency-based prediction markets platform.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行不应仓促降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）认为，欧洲央行不应过于急于降低借贷成本，而应保持灵活性。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t hurry too much to lower borrowing costs but remain flexible, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 选举结果公布前骚乱加剧，莫桑比克债券下跌
item.description: 莫桑比克 2031 年 9 月到期的美元债券连续第五天下跌，这是自 4 月以来最长的一次下挫，此前反对党领导人呼吁 "革命"，威胁要在周四公布选举结果时使政治动荡升级。【原文：Mozambique’s US dollar bonds due in September 2031 dropped for a fifth day, the longest selloff since April, after the opposition leader called for a “revolution,” threatening to escalate political unrest as election results are released Thursday.】

item.title: 德国经济下滑，到 2028 年税收收入将减少 126 亿欧元
item.description: 由于欧洲最大的经济体在努力增长，德国联邦政府预计到 2028 年的五年内税收收入将比 5 月份估计的少 126 亿欧元（136 亿美元）。【原文：The German federal government expects €12.6 billion ($13.6 billion) less in tax revenue in the five years through 2028 than estimated in May as Europe’s biggest economy struggles to grow.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所 Kraken 计划明年初推出自己的区块链
item.description: 世界上历史最悠久的加密货币交易所之一 Kraken 计划明年初推出区块链，用于去中心化应用，允许在没有中介的情况下进行代币交易、借贷。【原文：One of world’s oldest crypto exchanges, Kraken, plans to launch a blockchain early next year for decentralized applications that allow for trading, borrowing and lending of tokens without intermediaries.】
